column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Pema says : " Oh , first he ate the fruit , then he ate the leaves .
#Text=" Pema says : " Should we play the button game ?
#Text=Who has a button ?
#Text=" Pema says : " Where do these badgermoles come from ?
#Text=" Wu says : " The zoo !
#Text=Mako always hated my singing , but they love it !
#Text=" Evacuee says : " Well , what are we supposed to do with badgermoles ?
#Text=" Wu says : " They 're the best earthbenders around !
#Text=We can use them to tunnel out of the city without Kuvira 's troops spotting us .
#Text=" Evacuee says : " Are you sure this is the best plan ?
#Text=Let 's follow the moles !
#Text=" Wu says : " Badgermoles , digging holes , under Republic City .
#Text=Got to run away from Kuvira today , although I do still think she 's pretty .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " Mech platoons , report .
#Text=" Third platoon says : " Third platoon , no sign of anyone so far .
#Text=" Fourth platoon says : " Fourth platoon , en route to train station .
#Text=" Soldier says : " I think we found the source of the electromagnetic pulse : Future Industries Tower .
#Text=" Kuvira says : " That 's the place .
#Text="
